title: HaystackAnalytics develops first Universal Infectious Disease (ID) genomic test
description: Chennai: Healthtech startup HaystackAnalytics on Monday said it has developed India’s first Universal Infectious Disease (ID) genomic test, claiming to make it the world’s first company to bring genomics based infectious diseases diagnostic to hospitals. Read more at: https://economictimes.indiatimes.com/tech/technology/haystackanalytics-develops-first-universal-infectious-disease-id-genomic-test/articleshow/89405780.cms?utm_source=contentofinterest&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=cppst
